text: Panagiotis Papadopoulos is a Greek wrestler who specializes in Greco-Roman wrestling. He was a competed at the 2008 Summer Olympics in the super- heavyweight division, losing in his opening bout to Liu Deli from China.Olympic results ==References== Category:Olympic wrestlers of Greece Category:Wrestlers at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Living people Category:Greek male sport wrestlers Category:Mediterranean Games silver medalists for Greece Category:Competitors at the 2009 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in wrestling Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Panagiotis Papadopoulos
